delegateRewards(address,uint8,bytes32,by.details: Fails if the address is already a delegate or has an account .Fails if the current account is already participating in validation.v, r, s constitute `delegate`'s signature on `msg.sender`.Any accumulated rewards will be first paid out to the previous rewards recipient.

params.r: Output value r of the ECDSA signature.
params.s: Output value s of the ECDSA signature.
params.v: The recovery id of the incoming ECDSA signature.

delegateValidating(address,uint8,bytes32.details: Fails if the address is already a delegate or has an account .Fails if the current account is already participating in validation.v, r, s constitute `delegate`'s signature on `msg.sender`.

params.r: Output value r of the ECDSA signature.
params.s: Output value s of the ECDSA signature.
params.v: The recovery id of the incoming ECDSA signature.

delegateVoting(address,uint8,bytes32,byt.details: Fails if the delegate address is already a delegate or has an account .Fails if the current account is already voting.v, r, s constitute `delegate`'s signature on `msg.sender`.

params.r: Output value r of the ECDSA signature.
params.s: Output value s of the ECDSA signature.
params.v: The recovery id of the incoming ECDSA signature.

params.noticePeriod: The notice period for the deposit.

getAccountFromRewardsRecipient(address).details: Fails if the `accountOrDelegate` is a non-rewards delegate.

params.accountOrDelegate: The address of the account or rewards delegate.

getAccountFromValidator(address).details: Fails if the `accountOrDelegate` is a non-validating delegate.

params.accountOrDelegate: The address of the account or validating delegate.

getAccountFromVoter(address).details: Fails if the `accountOrDelegate` is a non-voting delegate.

params.accountOrDelegate: The address of the account or voting delegate.

getAccountWeight(address).return: The weight of the specified account.

getAvailabilityTimes(address).return: The availability times of all notified deposits for `_account`.

params.noticePeriod: The notice period of the bonded deposit.

getBondedDeposit(address,uint256).return: The value and index of the specified bonded deposit.

getDepositWeight(uint256,uint256).details: A deposit's weight is (1 + sqrt(noticePeriodDays) / 30) * value.

params.noticePeriod: The notice period of the deposit.

getNoticePeriods(address).return: The notice periods of all bonded deposits for `_account`.

params.availabilityTime: The availability time of the notified deposit.

getNotifiedDeposit(address,uint256).return: The value and index of the specified notified deposit.

getRewardsLastRedeemed(address).return: The timestamp of the last time `_account` redeemed block rewards.

getRewardsRecipientFromAccount(address).return: The rewards recipient for the account.

getValidatorFromAccount(address).return: The address authorized to validate on behalf of the account

getVoterFromAccount(address).return: The address authorized to vote on behalf of the account

params.increase: The amount to increase the notice period by.
params.noticePeriod: The notice period of the bonded deposit.
params.value: The amount of the bonded deposit to increase the notice period for.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

isVoting(address).return: Whether or not the account is voting.

isVotingFrozen(address).details: Frozen accounts can retract existing votes but not make future votes.
isVotingFrozen(address).return: Whether or not the account's voting power is frozen.

params.noticePeriod: The notice period of the bonded deposit.
params.value: The amount of the deposit to eventually withdraw.

params.availabilityTime: The availability time of the notified deposit.
params.value: The amount of the deposit to rebond.

redeemRewards().details: Fails if `msg.sender` is not the owner or rewards recipient of the account.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

setCumulativeRewardWeight(uint256).details: Called by the EVM at the end of the block.

params.blockReward: The total reward allocated to bonders for this block.

params.registryAddress: The address of a registry contract for routing to other contracts.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

params.availabilityTime: The availability time of the notified deposit.

delegateRewards(address,uint8,bytes32,by.notice: Delegates the rewards of `msg.sender`'s account to another address.

delegateValidating(address,uint8,bytes32.notice: Delegates the validating power of `msg.sender`'s account to another address.

delegateVoting(address,uint8,bytes32,byt.notice: Delegates the voting power of `msg.sender`'s account to another address.

deposit(uint256).notice: Adds a bonded deposit to `msg.sender`'s account.

freezeVoting().notice: Freezes the voting power of `msg.sender`'s account.

getAccountFromRewardsRecipient(address).notice: Returns the account associated with the provided account or rewards delegate.

getAccountFromValidator(address).notice: Returns the account associated with the provided account or validating delegate.

getAccountFromVoter(address).notice: Returns the account associated with the provided account or voting delegate.

getAccountWeight(address).notice: Returns the weight of a specified account.

getAvailabilityTimes(address).notice: Returns the availability times of all notified deposits for an account.

getBondedDeposit(address,uint256).notice: Returns the value and index of a specified bonded deposit.

getDepositWeight(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns the weight of a deposit for a given notice period.

getNoticePeriods(address).notice: Returns the notice periods of all bonded deposits for an account.

getNotifiedDeposit(address,uint256).notice: Returns the value and index of a specified notified deposit.

getRewardsLastRedeemed(address).notice: Returns the timestamp of the last time the account redeemed block rewards.

getRewardsRecipientFromAccount(address).notice: Returns the rewards recipient for a specified account.

getValidatorFromAccount(address).notice: Returns the address authorized to validate on behalf of a specified account.

getVoterFromAccount(address).notice: Returns the address authorized to vote on behalf of a specified account.

increaseNoticePeriod(uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Increases the notice period for all or part of a bonded deposit.

isVoting(address).notice: Returns whether or not a specified account is voting.

isVotingFrozen(address).notice: Returns whether or not an account's voting power is frozen.

notify(uint256,uint256).notice: Notifies a bonded deposit, allowing funds to be withdrawn after the notice period.

rebond(uint256,uint256).notice: Rebonds a notified deposit, with notice period >= the remaining time to availability.

redeemRewards().notice: Redeems rewards accrued since the last redemption for the specified account.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setCumulativeRewardWeight(uint256).notice: Sets the cumulative block reward for 1 unit of account weight.

setMaxNoticePeriod(uint256).notice: Sets the maximum notice period for an account.

setRegistry(address).notice: Updates the address pointing to a Registry contract.

unfreezeVoting().notice: Unfreezes the voting power of `msg.sender`'s account.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraws a notified deposit after the duration of the notice period.
